channel.title: Softlayer_container_network_storage_host on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_container_network_storage_host on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_Storage_Host
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_Storage_Host Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Network_Storage_Host will contain the reference id field for the object associated with the host. The host object type will also be returned. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Storage::allowAccessFromHost SoftLayer_Network_Storage::removeAccessFromHost Local id Reference id field for object associated with host. Type: integer objectType Type for the object associated with host Type: string
